languages.text: "Я не так долго пробыла здесь — один полет от Футфола, и то, второе путешествие, в ходе которого я почти все время томилась в медотсеке. Про первый полет я мало что могу рассказать... молитвы и размышления занимали меня больше, чем окружающие люди или сам путь".

traits.locale_text: "Я не так долго пробыла здесь — один полет от Футфола, и то, второе путешествие, в ходе которого я почти все время томилась в медотсеке. Про первый полет я мало что могу рассказать... молитвы и размышления занимали меня больше, чем окружающие люди или сам путь".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."
languages.original_text: "Я не так долго пробыла здесь — один полет от Футфола, и то, второе путешествие, в ходе которого я почти все время томилась в медотсеке. Про первый полет я мало что могу рассказать... молитвы и размышления занимали меня больше, чем окружающие люди или сам путь".

traits.locale_text: "I hasn't been here that long — just one flight from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first flight... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hasn't been here that long — just one flight from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first flight... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我在这里没呆太久，仅仅是离开了落脚港一趟，还有另一趟旅行。我绝大部分时间都是在医疗甲板上度过的。第一次航行的情形，我恐怕已经不太记得了……我当时绝大部分时间都是在专注地祈祷、冥想，没太在意周围的人，也没太在意那场旅途本身。”
languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

traits.locale_text: “我在这里没呆太久，仅仅是离开了落脚港一趟，还有另一趟旅行。我绝大部分时间都是在医疗甲板上度过的。第一次航行的情形，我恐怕已经不太记得了……我当时绝大部分时间都是在专注地祈祷、冥想，没太在意周围的人，也没太在意那场旅途本身。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

languages.text: «No llevaba mucho tiempo aquí. Solo un viaje desde Paso y luego el de vuelta, del cual me pasé la mayor parte en la cubierta médica. Tampoco puedo hablarle mucho del viaje de ida... estaba más centrada en mis plegarias y meditaciones que en la gente que me rodeaba o el propio viaje».
languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

traits.locale_text: «No llevaba mucho tiempo aquí. Solo un viaje desde Paso y luego el de vuelta, del cual me pasé la mayor parte en la cubierta médica. Tampoco puedo hablarle mucho del viaje de ida... estaba más centrada en mis plegarias y meditaciones que en la gente que me rodeaba o el propio viaje».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「それほど長いものではない…フットフォールからの1回の旅と、大半を医療室の中で過ごしたもう1回の旅路だけだ。最初の航海のことはあまり話すこともない…周りの人々や旅そのものよりも、祈りや内省に集中していたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

traits.locale_text: 「それほど長いものではない…フットフォールからの1回の旅と、大半を医療室の中で過ごしたもう1回の旅路だけだ。最初の航海のことはあまり話すこともない…周りの人々や旅そのものよりも、祈りや内省に集中していたのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war noch gar nicht lange hier gewesen — nur eine Reise von Footfall aus sowie die andere Reise, die ich größtenteils auf der Krankenstation verbracht habe. Über die erste Reise kann ich Euch nicht viel sagen ... Ich war mehr auf Gebete und Überlegungen konzentriert denn auf meine Mitreisenden oder die Reise selbst."
languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war noch gar nicht lange hier gewesen — nur eine Reise von Footfall aus sowie die andere Reise, die ich größtenteils auf der Krankenstation verbracht habe. Über die erste Reise kann ich Euch nicht viel sagen ... Ich war mehr auf Gebete und Überlegungen konzentriert denn auf meine Mitreisenden oder die Reise selbst."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'en ai pas fait tant que cela. J'ai fait à bord un simple voyage depuis Castel et un autre, que j'ai presque intégralement passé confinée dans l'infirmerie. Je ne peux pas vous dire grand-chose du premier. Je me suis concentrée davantage sur mes prières et réflexions que sur les gens qui m'entouraient ou le périple en lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai pas fait tant que cela. J'ai fait à bord un simple voyage depuis Castel et un autre, que j'ai presque intégralement passé confinée dans l'infirmerie. Je ne peux pas vous dire grand-chose du premier. Je me suis concentrée davantage sur mes prières et réflexions que sur les gens qui m'entouraient ou le périple en lui-même. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gemide çok kalmadım. Binliman'dan çıktığımız yolculuk ve bahsettiğim diğer seyahat haricinde gemide değildim. O diğer seyahatin büyük bir kısmını da revirde geçirdim. İlk yolculukla ilgili pek bir şey söyleyemem... Etrafımdakilerden ve yolculuğun kendisinden ziyade dualarıma ve düşüncelerime odaklanmıştım."
languages.original_text: "I hadn't been here that long — just one journey from Footfall and the other journey, the majority of which I spent in the confines of the medbay. I can't tell you much about the first voyage... I was more focused on prayers and ruminations than on the people around me or the journey itself."

traits.locale_text: "Gemide çok kalmadım. Binliman'dan çıktığımız yolculuk ve bahsettiğim diğer seyahat haricinde gemide değildim. O diğer seyahatin büyük bir kısmını da revirde geçirmiştim. İlk yolculukla ilgili pek bir şey söyleyemem... Etrafımdakilerden ve yolculuğun kendisinden ziyade dualarıma ve düşüncelerime odaklanmıştım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
